1. Aries - 7/10 - Natural-born leaders, Aries tend to be impulsive and action-oriented.
2. Taurus - 5/10 - Practical and dependable, Tauruses are not naturally inclined towards sudden decisions.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and adaptable, Geminis thrive in environments that encourage flexibility.
4. Cancer - 3/10 - Emotional and sensitive, Cancers often require more time to consider options before making a move.

6. Virgo - 4/10 - Analytical and detail-oriented, Virgos approach decisions with caution and thoroughness.
7. Libra - 6/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans weigh options carefully before making a decision that suits their sense of fairness.

11. Aquarius - 9/10 - Humanitarian and independent, Aquarians tend to be open-minded and willing to take calculated risks for a greater good.
